Software: FPHI

Fast and Powerful Heritability Inference


FPHI toolbox for Heritability Inference for Related Subjects Based on Neuroimaging Phenotypes - Beta Release!

Please contact Habib Ganjgahi & Tom Nichols with any questions.

  • Paper-- Fast and powerful heritability inference for family-based neuroimaging studies. Neuroimage, doi:10.1016/j.neuroimage.2015.03.005.
  • Software-- Matlab toolbox for spm8, spm 12 or FSL  FPHI.zip (Last Updated 24/04/2015).

Oxford Big Data Institute at the University of Oxford
